   From: Staff <anna.antenucci@...>
Subject: Re: Re: 10mm Samurai miniatures

nice! but I suck at painting 10mm anyone knows where to buy 25mm
miniatures
of Japanese samurais (and ashigaru too!)

Rob replies-->

Dixon Miniatures do a complete range.

Foundry have a small range.
Amazon Miniatures have quite a range.
Village Green do some.
Old glory I think.
Ral Patha had a range as well.

First corp do the seven Samurai figures as a pack which are really nice.
(Available in the new year as the company is undergoing change of
ownership right now.

I have around 600 Dixon figures plus a whole bunch of Ninjas and other
firms miniatures.
Over 700 in total because I recently starting painting them and getting
them organised properly so decided to count them!

Any other questions please ask.

Hoe that helps

Kind regards

Rob
